Name: Vasso
Review Text: Vasso is a warm and friendly Italian restaurant hidden in the back streets of Amsterdam. Whilst the food is not intentionally made to look like a piece of art, my bruschetta and spigola al guazzetto (sea bass stew) more than made up for ‚Ä¶

Name: Vasso
Review Text: The pasta was absolutely delicious. My friend and I both really enjoyed our salmon and mushroom pasta. It was a bit pricey. The service was just OK - the waitress was not very friendly to start, but then warmed up afterwards. ‚Ä¶

Name: Vasso
Review Text: Highly recommendable italian kitchen. stop by when you're around. Sorrounded by a very amsterdammer setting where you can easily continue  walking around the city center. I recommend the mixed platter to start. (pictures) follow @quiquinnv for more experiences

Name: Vasso
Review Text: We ate 1 starter and fish. The fish and wine were good. Did not wait to be seated. Italian restaurant.

Name: Vasso

Name: Vasso
Review Text: Only positive words to say about this place. Stunning, homemade, authentic Italian food with exceptional service. The antipasto starter was varied and really flavoursome. The lobster and shellfish pasta knocked our socks off and the chef can only be complimented. Would recommend this place any day!

Name: Vasso
Review Text: Cosy place, very friendly staff. Unfortunately the food didn't live up to expectations. I had the beef-filled tortellini, and I also tasted from my friends' steaks. None were particularly impressive. I will not be returning.

Name: Vasso
Review Text: Awesome food, some good wines too. Staff is nice too. It's not large, so booky it or come a little earlier than the rest to get a table.

Name: Vasso
Review Text:

Name: Vasso
Review Text: Great food but service was substandard. We ate entrees and mains but didn't stay for desserts since no one checked on us if we needed any + the long wait for any waiter to show up by our table to get the check was enough.

Name: Vasso
Review Text: Vasso is a typical Italian restaurant in the center of Amsterdam. It is located very near the Kalverstraat, the main shopping street in Amsterdam and at a five minute walk from the Rokin hotel where we stayed. The dishes aren't cheap, but ‚Ä¶

Name: Vasso
Review Text: Pasta was simply delicious! Waitress made some great suggestions that were spot on! Staff was very friendly and humorous! Enjoyable time for all!

Name: Vasso
Review Text: Great authentic Italian food including handmade pastas. Staff speaks Italian so you get the real experience. Nice wine list, just limited. Brunello is on the list!! Highly recommended.

Name: Vasso
Review Text: High-class Italian food. Reasonable prices for Amsterdam. Friendly staff. Nice location in a small and quite alleyway in a normally very busy area.

Name: Vasso
Review Text: Very good and delicious Italian food. The waiters are young Italians who really pay attention to their customers. Good service and excellent good.

Name: Vasso

Name: Vasso
